Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Geolocation: Critical for mapping provider locations and targeting local alerts.

Provider Integration: Requires lightweight, secure APIs or manual processes for clinics/pharmacies to update real-time inventory and appointment slots

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data Trust and Verification: Establishing credibility and trust as a source of verified health information, requiring strong partnership with local health departments.

Provider Participation: Gaining buy-in from busy, disparate private healthcare providers (pharmacies, clinics) to consistently update their real-time inventory.

HIPAA/Privacy: While the system is non-clinical, any feature involving personal health history (like the family scheduler) must be built with strict security and privacy control
